seo.title: Privacy Policy | GanakaHub
seo.description: Privacy Policy for GanakaHub.com describing what data we collect, how we use it, cookies, analytics, security, and your choices.
seo.author: GanakaHub

privacyIntro.title: Privacy Policy
privacyIntro.p1: Welcome to GanakaHub.com (“GanakaHub”, “we”, “our”, “us”). This Privacy Policy explains what information we collect, how we use it, and the choices you have. By using our website, tools, and services (including finance tools, student tools, and utility tools), you agree to the practices described here. If you do not agree, please discontinue use of GanakaHub.

privacySection1.title: 1) Who We Are
privacySection1.p1: GanakaHub provides online calculators and utilities designed for informational and educational purposes. We respect your privacy and aim to collect only what is necessary to operate and improve our services.

privacySection2.title: 2) Information We Collect
privacySection2.p1: We primarily collect limited, non-personal information to keep the site running smoothly and understand usage patterns. Generally, we do not require you to create an account or provide sensitive data to use our calculators.
list: Technical Data: IP address (often anonymized), device type, operating system, browser type/version, language, screen size, and general location (country/region).
Usage Data: pages viewed, time on page, referring URLs, buttons clicked, scroll depth, and error logs for debugging.
Cookie Data: small text files stored on your device to remember preferences, measure traffic, and improve experience.

Tool Inputs (Ephemeral): values you enter into our calculators. These are used to compute results in your browser and are generally not stored by us unless explicitly stated for a feature (e.g., saved preferences in the future).
privacySection2.p3: We do not knowingly collect sensitive personal data (such as passwords, bank credentials, Aadhaar numbers, or medical records).

privacySection3.title: 3) How We Use Information
privacySection3.p1: We use the information we collect to:
list: Operate, maintain, and improve our calculators and website.
Monitor performance, fix issues, and enhance usability.
Measure traffic, understand user behavior, and plan new features.
Protect the site against abuse, fraud, and security threats.
Comply with legal obligations and enforce our Terms & Conditions.

privacySection4.title: 4) Legal Bases (Where Applicable)
privacySection4.p1: Depending on your region, we may rely on one or more of the following legal bases to process your information: legitimate interests (to operate and secure our services), consent (for certain cookies/analytics), and compliance with legal obligations.

privacySection5.title: 5) Cookies & Similar Technologies
privacySection5.p1: We use cookies and similar technologies to remember preferences, analyze traffic, and improve performance. You can manage cookies via your browser settings and, where available, a cookie banner or preferences panel. Disabling certain cookies may affect site functionality.

privacySection6.title: 6) Analytics, Advertising & Affiliates
privacySection6.p1: We may use privacy-conscious analytics tools to measure engagement and improve the site. We may also display ads or affiliate links. Third parties involved in analytics or ads may set their own cookies and collect data as described in their privacy policies. We do not sell your personal information.

privacySection7.title: 7) When We Share Information
privacySection7.p1: We do not sell your data. We may share limited information with:
list: Service Providers: vendors who help us operate the site (e.g., hosting, analytics, security). They are bound by contractual obligations to protect your data.
Legal/Compliance: when required by law, regulation, legal process, or to protect rights, safety, and integrity of GanakaHub and its users.
Business Changes: if we undergo a merger, acquisition, or asset transfer, your data may be transferred as part of that transaction with appropriate safeguards.

privacySection8.title: 8) Data Retention
privacySection8.p1: We retain analytics and server logs for only as long as necessary to fulfill the purposes outlined in this policy, comply with legal obligations, resolve disputes, and enforce agreements. Calculator inputs are typically processed in your browser and not stored on our servers unless a feature clearly indicates saving preferences.

privacySection9.title: 9) Data Security
privacySection9.p1: We implement reasonable technical and organizational measures to protect information against unauthorized access, alteration, or destruction. However, no method of transmission or storage is 100% secure, and we cannot guarantee absolute security.

privacySection10.title: 10) Children’s Privacy
privacySection10.p1: GanakaHub is intended for general audiences and not directed to children under 13 (or the applicable age in your region). We do not knowingly collect personal data from children. If you believe a child has provided personal data, please contact us so we can take appropriate action.

privacySection11.title: 11) International Data Transfers
privacySection11.p1: We may process information on servers located outside your state or country. Where required, we implement safeguards designed to protect your information during such transfers.

privacySection12.title: 12) Your Choices & Controls
privacySection12.p1: You can control certain data collection by:
list: Adjusting browser settings to block or delete cookies.
Using privacy or tracking protection modes where available.
Opting out of analytics/advertising cookies (where offered).

privacySection13.title: 13) Your Rights
privacySection13.p1: Depending on your jurisdiction, you may have rights to access, update, correct, or delete certain information, or object to/limit processing. You may also have the right to withdraw consent where processing is based on consent. To exercise these rights, contact us using the details below. We may need to verify your identity before responding.

privacySection14.title: 14) Third-Party Links
privacySection14.p1: Our website may link to external sites we do not operate. We are not responsible for the content or privacy practices of those websites. Review their policies before providing any personal information.

privacySection15.title: 15) Changes to This Policy
privacySection15.p1: We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. Changes will be posted on this page with an updated “Last Updated” date. Your continued use of GanakaHub after such changes means you accept the revised policy. We encourage you to review this page periodically.

privacySection16.title: 16) Contact & Grievance
privacySection16.p1: If you have questions, requests, or complaints regarding privacy, you can contact us:
privacySection16.p2: If you are located in India and wish to raise a concern under applicable laws, you may write to our Grievance Officer at the email above. Please include sufficient details to help us address your request (e.g., specific URL, description of the issue, and your contact information).

privacyFinalNote.p1: This Privacy Policy is intended to be clear and simple. It does not create contractual or legal rights on behalf of any party, except as required by applicable law. For how we govern your use of the site, please refer to our Terms & Conditions.
